review: Fire TV is nice. I think the free part needs to be a bit less advertised. There's a lot of free stuff, but even some old TV shows from the 80s are still pay. Not real happy with Fire TV. Let's hope the menu expands to more free content

review: I admire the Fire TV for its voice and gaming features, although I rarely use them. I cannot give it more than 3 stars as there are two vital elements missing: 1) lighted buttons on remote, and 2) built-in ability to receive IR signals from custom remotes. I can only hope that Amazon will allow trade-ins of the original FireTVs when these features are added to the next release.

review: Voice search is amazing. It really works. Less using a four directional keypad to enter in titles is a real time saver and makes you wonder why this wasn't done before but it is only for Amazon content and VEVO (music videos) (at least for now). You can not use the voice search with Netflix for example.
